definition: to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale

sentences.english: First, a suction tube with a knife-like edge is inserted into the womb.
sentences.chinese: 首先，吸力管刀一样的优势是插入到子宫。

sentences.english: The vacuum cleaner has weak suction.
sentences.chinese: 真空吸尘器的吸力很弱。

sentences.english: The sand dropped off steeply, and a riptide was sucking the woman un-der.
sentences.chinese: 沙床边缘非常陡峭，并且激流的吸力将妇人往下拽。

sentences.english: The gravity enables us to live naturally on land.
sentences.chinese: 地心吸力让我们能在陆地上正常生活。

sentences.english: Because of gravity, long flight would be exhausted.
sentences.chinese: 由于地心吸力，长途飞行会感到筋疲力尽。

sentences.english: Slam dunking a basketball is a fight against gravity.
sentences.chinese: 扣篮是需要与地心吸力对抗。

sentences.english: Some pumps and all vacuum cleaners work by suction.
sentences.chinese: 有些泵和所有的真空吸尘器都是藉吸力工作的。

sentences.english: Imagine two high-suction vacuum cleaners clamped onto your back.
sentences.chinese: 想像两台高吸力真空吸尘器夹在你的背上是什么感觉。

sentences.english: When there is no gravitation , our feet no longer stay on the ground .
sentences.chinese: 如果没有地心吸力，我们的脚就不能再站在地面上了。

sentences.english: With the same matrix suction, the soil samples under high net confining pressure produced larger volume strain.
sentences.chinese: 相同基质吸力下的土样在高围压下产生更大的体应变。

sentences.english: That's like blaming gravity for the glass you broke.
sentences.chinese: 那好比打破杯子却怪罪地心吸力。

sentences.english: Some suction is provided by the ejector scrubber and the tail gas fan.
sentences.chinese: 喷射洗涤器和尾气排风机可提供部分吸力。

sentences.english: This suction towards death can frequently explain severe illnesses.
sentences.chinese: 拽向死亡的吸力通常也能解释严重的疾病。

sentences.english: At that height, the ability of the tree to pump nutrients is overcome by gravity.
sentences.chinese: 在那高度，树的能力去泵高营养是战胜地心吸力。

sentences.english: The effect of negative pore-water pressure (suction) is often ignored in slope stability studies.
sentences.chinese: 在边坡稳定性研究中，吸力的影响经常被忽略。

sentences.english: The methods of calculating the effective wetting front suction were summarized in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 概述了国内外确定湿润锋面处的有效基质吸力的方法。

definition: to draw (towards)/to be drawn to/to be sucked in
in Daoism, astral wind on which immortals may ride/strong wind
